meanings.sent1: She outpitches her teammate during practice.
meanings.sent2: The young pitcher outpitches the experienced player.
meanings.sent3: The little league player outpitches the coach, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outpitches her opponents is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: With her focused practice, she consistently outpitches her competitors.

meanings.sent1: He outpitches his rival in every game.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher outpitches his own record with each match.
meanings.sent3: The cat outpitches the dog in catching the ball during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to outpitches her previous performance is commendable.
meanings.sent5: The pitcher's determination to outpitches the odds is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To throw better pitches than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outpitches her brother in their backyard games.
meanings.sent2: The professional pitcher outpitches his opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The rookie player outpitches the veteran with his surprising skills.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outpitches her competitors is unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The pitcher's focus allows him to consistently outpitches his rivals.
